Play:
The Go Game Strategy
(Goban taiheiki / 碁盤太平記 碁盤太平記)

Written By: Chikamatsu Monzaemon (近松門左衛門)

First Staged: 1706

Reference: Bunraku February 1980 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

January 1974: The Go Game Strategy

February 1980: The Go Game Strategy

Characters:

Rikiya (Ōboshi Rikiya / 大星力弥)

Okahei, in fact Heiemon Teraoka (Yakko Okahei jitsuwa Teraoka Heiemon / 奴岡平実は寺岡平右衛門)

Acolyte (Shoke / 所化)

Pilgrim (Junrei / 巡礼)

Packhorse driver (Umakata / 馬方)

Traveling priest (Kōya Hijiri / 高野聖)

Courier (Hikyaku / 飛脚)

Yuranosuke (Ōboshi Yuranosuke / 大星由良之介)

Yuranosuke's wife (Yuranosuke tsuma / 由良之介妻)

Yuranosuke's mother (Yuranosuke haha / 由良之介母)
